SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into member_registerlog ( id, registerDate, memberId, deviceNo, city, lbs, promotionSource, terminalChannel, appSource, version) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sysdate(), #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotionSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
